item.title: Swarovski Crystal Earrings
item.dc:creator: totalthememain
item.content:encoded: Beauty is perfect in its imperfections, so you just have to go with the imperfections. I think I'd go mad if I didn't have a place to escape to. Fashion is a very stressful place to work because of the demands of doing the shows - no one expects a writer to produce two books a year on the dot - but it's also a very toxic place to work. I didn't want to be a fashion designer, and for a good half of my career I didn't like it. I always wanted to do other things. Jeans represent democracy in fashion.
item.excerpt:encoded:
A set of stud Swarovski Crystal earrings from NLY Accessories on NELLY.com. This set includes one set of gold and garnet drop earrings.
  • 1 Set
  • Nickel free
  • Gold plated
  • Swarovski Crystal

item.title: Powder Contour Kit
item.dc:creator: totalthememain
item.content:encoded: I've always thought of the T-shirt as the Alpha and Omega of the fashion alphabet. I am like a freight train. Working on the details, twisting them and playing with them over the years, but always staying on the same track. If you cut a painter's hands off, he'd still feel the urge to pick up a brush. I'd like to believe that the women who wear my clothes are not dressing for other people, that they're wearing what they like and what suits them. It's not a status thing. I believe in comfort. If you don't feel comfortable in your clothes, it's hard to think of anything else.
item.excerpt:encoded:
6 Color Contour Powder bySmashit for NELLY.com is a contouring palette with sixcompact powders.All powders are matte and perfect for contouring to createsymmetry.
  • Matte finish
  • 6 Unique colors
  • 6.5 cm Powders
  • Professional Quality

item.title: Bombshell Short Dress
item.dc:creator: totalthememain
item.content:encoded: Go to a place where you're not going to be stressed, because a honeymoon itself can be a stressful thing. We have got to change our ethics and our financial system and our whole way of understanding the world. It has to be a world in which people live rather than die; a sustainable world. It could be great. Attention to detail is of utmost importance when you want to look good. It's a philosophy of life. A practice. If you do this, something will change, what will change is that you will change, your life will change, and if you can change you, you can perhaps change the world. I didn't want to be a fashion designer, and for a good half of my career I didn't like it. I always wanted to do other things.
item.excerpt:encoded:
A short bandeau dress with sequins in stretchy material from NLY One only on NELLY.com. With a low-v neckline and built-in underwire for extra support.
  • Champagne color
  • Zipper closure
  • 95% Polyester
  • 5% Elastane

item.title: Caged Sandal with Gold Trim
item.dc:creator: totalthememain
item.content:encoded: I didn't want to be a fashion designer, and for a good half of my career I didn't like it. I always wanted to do other things. I adore the challenge of creating truly modern clothes, where a woman's personality and sense of self are revealed. I want people to see the dress, but focus on the woman. I believe that my clothes can give people a better image of themselves - that it can increase their feelings of confidence and happiness. Confidence. If you have it, you can make anything look good. Fashion should be fun. It shouldn't be labelled intellectual.
item.excerpt:encoded:
Party shoes in suede from River Island only available from NELLY.com. Open toe and thin heel. Crisscrossing suede straps with decorative gold details.
  • 11.5 cm Heel
  • Rubber outsole
  • Real suede
  • Zipper closure

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Super cute heel for going out!

item.title: Black Laced Choker Necklace
item.dc:creator: totalthememain
item.content:encoded: We live in an era of globalization and the era of the woman. Never in the history of the world have women been more in control of their destiny. I don't try to be in fashion; I don't try to follow trends. You just end up out of fashion that way. Success isn't about the end result, it's about what you learn along the way. The important thing is to take your time and not get stressed. Fashion is not something that exists in dresses only. Fashion is in the sky, in the street, fashion has to do with ideas, the way we live, what is happening.
item.excerpt:encoded:
Necklace with thin laces from NLY Accessories available on NELLY.com. Black lace and silver chain with silver feather accents.
  • Nickel free
  • 25 cm Long
  • Silver tone charm
  • Extended included

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I love this choker! It's a great length and matches everything in my closet!

item.title: Blushing Lipgloss Palette
item.dc:creator: totalthememain
item.content:encoded: Fashion fosters cliches of beauty, but I want to tear them apart. For me, art is about learning and about living with people. It's alive. I can design a collection in a day and I always do, cause I've always got a load of Italians on my back, moaning that it's late. My breakfast is very important. My aim is to make the poor look rich and the rich look poor.
item.excerpt:encoded:
10 Color Lipgloss Palette from Smashit is a lip palette with 10 beautiful colors from NELLY.com. These lip glosses in a range of shades will glide on your lips like a dream.
  • 10 Unique shades
  • Lip brush included
  • Vegan formula
  • Not tested on animals

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I love this lipgloss palette. It has tons of colors and is easy to take with me anywhere. I do which there was a clear or gloss color included though, so 4 stars.

item.title: Cover All Mix Concealer
item.dc:creator: totalthememain
item.content:encoded: I like the things around me to be beautiful and slightly dreamy, with a feeling of worldliness. Today, I'm very happy about myself, because I realized my dreams. I learned how to understand what people want. I always say: To be well dressed you must be well naked. A woman is never sexier than when she is comfortable in her clothes. There are only three things I can do - make a dress, decorate a house, and entertain people.
item.excerpt:encoded:
A high-pigment, multi-purpose, luxury concealer from NELLY.com. Cover imperfections, redness, tattoos or discolorations. Mix and match to create your perfect color.
  • NEW Creamy formula
  • 3 Shades
  • Hypoallergenic
  • Not tested on animals

item.title: Cross Back Strap Dress
item.dc:creator: totalthememain
item.content:encoded: I want people to be afraid of the women I dress. I think there is something about luxury - it's not something people need, but it's what they want. It really pulls at their heart. I think the idea of mixing luxury and mass-market fashion is very modern, very now - no one wears head-to-toe designer anymore. I want to thank all the women who have worn my clothes, the famous and the unknown, who have been so faithful to me and given me so much joy. I feel that things happen for a reason and open up new opportunities.
item.excerpt:encoded:
A classic and sexy bress from NLY One on NELLY.com. The low-v neckline with criss-crossing straps at back is sure to make an impact. Perfect for any event.
  • Black color
  • 92% Polyester
  • 8% Elastane
  • Stretchy fit

item.title: Cut Out Bare Back Dress
item.dc:creator: totalthememain
item.content:encoded: Those fashion designers are just crazy; but aren't we all? Go to a place where you're not going to be stressed, because a honeymoon itself can be a stressful thing. I have my favourite fashion decade, yes, yes, yes: '60s. It was a sort of little revolution; the clothes were amazing but not too exaggerated. We have got to change our ethics and our financial system and our whole way of understanding the world. It has to be a world in which people live rather than die; a sustainable world. It could be great. I would like to be a one-man multinational fashion phenomenon.
item.excerpt:encoded:
Fitted dress in soft jersey fabric from NLY One and only available on NELLY.com. A low crossing v-neck front and an openback make this look sweet and sexy.
  • Neon pink
  • 92% Polyester
  • 8% Elastane
  • Open back

item.title: About
item.dc:creator: totalthememain
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_heading text="4 Friends with a dream..." tag="h2"][vcex_spacing size="20px"][vc_column_text]We live in an era of globalization and the era of the woman. Never in the history of the world have women been more in control of their destiny. I dont try to be in fashion; I dont try to follow trends.
You just end up out of fashion that way. Success isnt about the end result, its about what you learn along the way. The important thing is to take your time and not get stressed. Fashion is not something that exists in dresses only.
Fashion is in the sky, in the street, fashion has to do with ideas, the way we live, what is happening.Sometimes incompetence is useful. It helps you keep an open mind. Over the years I have learned that what is important in a dress is the woman who is wearing it. I am not interested in shock tactics. I just want to make beautiful clothes. If you cut a painters hands off, hed still feel the urge to pick up a brush. Age and size are only numbers. Its the attitude you bring to clothes that make the difference.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_heading text="Curated with care" tag="h2"][vcex_spacing size="20px"][vc_column_text]Beauty is perfect in its imperfections, so you just have to go with the imperfections. I think Id go mad if I didnt have a place to escape to. Fashion is a very stressful place to work because of the demands of doing the shows no one expects a writer to produce two books a year on the dot but its also a very toxic place to work.
I didnt want to be a fashion designer, and for a good half of my career I didnt like it. I always wanted to do other things.
Jeans represent democracy in fashion. Sometimes incompetence is useful. It helps you keep an open mind. Vanity is the healthiest thing in life. Beauty is perfect in its imperfections, so you just have to go with the imperfections.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_heading text="Thank you for supporting us!" tag="h2"][vcex_spacing size="20px"][vc_column_text]Awkwardness gives me great comfort. Ive never been cool, but Ive felt cool. Ive been in the cool place, but I wasnt really cool I was trying to pass for hip or cool. Its the awkwardness thats nice. It pains me physically to see a woman victimized, rendered pathetic, by fashion.
You cannot be creative with people around you. An evening dress that reveals a womans ankles while walking is the most disgusting thing I have ever seen. When I was young, I lived like an old woman, and when I got old, I had to live like a young person. Fashion is made to become unfashionable. I think in the darkest moments, we need a break.
With all our love,[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image="191"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Who we are and why we do what we do

item.title: Get Great Deals on Unique Pieces in the Fall Sample Sale
item.dc:creator: totalthememain
item.content:encoded:
That is the key of this collection, being yourself. Dont be into trends. Dont make fashion own you, but you decide what you are, what you want to express by the way you dress and the way to live. I sometimes feel that a pattern is almost a fashion statement in itself. I do not have one theme for each season, I just try to make beautiful clothes all year round. People said making clothes inside out was not proper. I disagreed, because clothes that are inside out are as beautiful as a cathedral.

Sample H2 Heading

Ive been in the cool place, but I wasnt really cool I was trying to pass for hip or cool. Its the awkwardness thats nice. I think Id go mad if I didnt have a place to escape to. If you cut a painters hands off, this is a link hed still feel the urge to pick up a brush. I want to thank all the women who have worn my clothes, the famous and the unknown, who have been so faithful to me and given me so much joy.

More About Fashion

It pains me physically to see a woman victimized, rendered pathetic, by fashion. I didnt want to be a fashion designer, and for a good half of my career I didnt like it. I always wanted to do other things. Every day Im thinking about change. Jeans represent democracy in fashion. I love things that age well things that dont date, that stand the test of time and that become living examples of the absolute best. Fashion never stops. There is always the new project, the new opportunity. I have a fantastic relationship with money. I use it to buy my freedom. It is not easy to dress well. I am especially grateful that I have been able to keep my own style over the decades, in spite of the many changes that have taken place in the world of fashion and in its business. Confidence. If you have it, you can make anything look good. The only way to do something in depth is to work hard. I like the irony in my work. I like the irony in my work. I love a black dress. Men dont want another man to look at their woman because they dont know how to handle it. I get ideas about whats essential when packing my suitcase. I was the first person to have a punk rock hairstyle. I like the body. I like to design everything to do with the body. I am not interested in the past, except as the road to the future. I love the 2000s because everyone started to love haute couture.

Wrapping Up

It pains me physically to see a woman victimized, rendered pathetic, by fashion. I didnt want to be a fashion designer, and for a good half of my career I didnt like it. I always wanted to do other things. I adore the challenge of creating truly modern clothes, where a womans personality and sense of self are revealed. I want people to see the dress, but focus on the woman. I believe that my clothes can give people a better image of themselves that it can increase their feelings of confidence and happiness. Confidence. If you have it, you can make anything look good. Fashion should be fun. It shouldnt be labelled intellectual. Men have got more of a discerning eye. They appreciate cut and details, things that arent so obvious. They like things that have cachet and gentlemanliness.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: It pains me physically to see a woman victimized, rendered pathetic, by fashion. I didnt want to be a fashion designer, and for a good half of my career I didnt like it. I always wanted to do other things. Every day Im thinking about change. Jeans represent democracy in fashion. I love things that age well things that dont date, that stand the test of time and that become living examples of the absolute best.

I get ideas about whats essential when packing my suitcase. I was the first person to have a punk rock hairstyle. I like the body. I like to design everything to do with the body. I am not interested in the past, except as the road to the future. I love the 2000s because everyone started to love haute couture.

item.title: Must-have Retro Sunglasses Now in Stock
item.dc:creator: totalthememain
item.content:encoded:
I want people to see the dress, but focus on the woman. I believe that my clothes can give people a better image of themselves that it can increase their feelings of confidence and happiness. Confidence. If you have it, you can make anything look good. Fashion should be fun. It shouldnt be labelled intellectual. The only way to do something in depth is to work hard. I like the irony in my work. I like the irony in my work. I love a black dress. Men dont want another man to look at their woman because they dont know how to handle it. item.title: Embellished Clutch Bag
item.dc:creator: totalthememain
item.content:encoded: Sometimes incompetence is useful. It helps you keep an open mind. Over the years I have learned that what is important in a dress is the woman who is wearing it. I am not interested in shock tactics. I just want to make beautiful clothes. If you cut a painter's hands off, he'd still feel the urge to pick up a brush. Age and size are only numbers. It's the attitude you bring to clothes that make the difference.
item.excerpt:encoded:
Jeweled clutch from Miss Selfridge and sold on NELLY.com. This lovely clutch features a solid design, real stone embellishments and a metallic buckle closure.
  • Polyurethane
  • Lined interior
  • 100% Polyester lining
  • Chain shoulder strap

item.title: False Lash Effect Mascara
item.dc:creator: totalthememain
item.content:encoded: I have my permanent muses and my muses of the moment. I always thought what you wore underneath was as important as what you wear on top. Even Michelangelo got paid for doing the Sistine Chapel. To those artists who say they're doing it for the love of art, I say: Get real. Instead of buying six things, one thing that you really like. Don't keep buying just for the sake of it. I would like to be a one-man multinational fashion phenomenon.
item.excerpt:encoded:
A new blacker black Max Factor mascara from NELLY.com. With just one sweep you can have model worthy lashes that are lifted, curled, fuller and longer!
  • Blackest black
  • Plumping formula
  • Waterproof
  • Not tested on animals

item.title: High Heel Sandal
item.dc:creator: totalthememain
item.content:encoded: I've always thought of the T-shirt as the Alpha and Omega of the fashion alphabet. Success isn't about the end result, it's about what you learn along the way. Beauty is perfect in its imperfections, so you just have to go with the imperfections. Awkwardness gives me great comfort. I've never been cool, but I've felt cool. I've been in the cool place, but I wasn't really cool - I was trying to pass for hip or cool. It's the awkwardness that's nice. It is not easy to dress well.
item.excerpt:encoded:
Sandal in faux suede from NLY SHOES on NELLY.com. An open, roundtoe with strap at the frontand an open heel is both sexy and demure.
  • Nude color
  • Fabric & leather
  • Rubber outsole
  • 11.5 cm Heel

item.dc:creator: totalthememain

I am especially grateful that I have been able to keep my own style over the decades, in spite of the many changes that have taken place in the world of fashion and in its business. Confidence. If you have it, you can make anything look good.
item.excerpt:encoded:
Dress from NLY Trend from NELLY.com. The classic high cut neckline cut with thin straps is retro and sexy. Decorative stitching on front and back for a little something extra.
  • Berry color
  • 95% Cotton
  • 5% Elastane
  • Retro style

item.title: Jet Set Travel Crossbody
item.dc:creator: totalthememain
item.content:encoded: Clothes mean nothing until someone lives in them. Fashion is made to become unfashionable. Awkwardness gives me great comfort. I've never been cool, but I've felt cool. I've been in the cool place, but I wasn't really cool - I was trying to pass for hip or cool. It's the awkwardness that's nice. Design is a constant challenge to balance comfort with luxe, the practical with the desirable. Elegance is not the prerogative of those who have just escaped from adolescence, but of those who have already taken possession of their future.
item.excerpt:encoded:
Shoulder bag in genuine leather from Michael Michael Kors on NELLY.com. Dyed a bright poppy coral color this fully linedcrossbody bag is the perfect addition to your wardrobe.
  • Coral color
  • Genuine leather
  • 15.5 x11.5x4.5 cm
  • Detachable strap

item.title: Moisturizing Lipstick
item.dc:creator: totalthememain
item.content:encoded: Fashion fosters cliches of beauty, but I want to tear them apart. I still appreciate individuality. Style is much more interesting than fashion, really. I don't like trends. They tend to make everybody look the same. Elegance is not the prerogative of those who have just escaped from adolescence, but of those who have already taken possession of their future. You can't just buy things for the label - it's ridiculous.

Lipstick from Make Up Store on NELLY.com. This lovely lipstick has alight and soft texture with avelvety finishthatenriches, moisturizesandnourishes your lips.
  • Color - Attitude
  • Natural oils
  • Vitamin E
  • Not tested on animals

Over the years I have learned that what is important in a dress is the woman who is wearing it. Dressing is a way of life. Beauty is perfect in its imperfections, so you just have to go with the imperfections.

item.title: Low V Jaquard Dress
item.dc:creator: totalthememain
item.content:encoded: What I hate is nasty people. Fashion moves so quickly that, unless you have a strong point of view, you can lose integrity. I adore the challenge of creating truly modern clothes, where a woman's personality and sense of self are revealed. I want people to see the dress, but focus on the woman. I'm a fashion designer and people think, what do I know? I am always locked in my design studio.

  • 95% Polyester
  • 5% Elastane
  • Stretch fit

item.title: Mid Platform Sandal
item.dc:creator: totalthememain
item.content:encoded: I didn't want to be a fashion designer, and for a good half of my career I didn't like it. I always wanted to do other things. I like things simple. Age is something only in your head or a stereotype. Age means nothing when you are passionate about something. I think there is something about luxury - it's not something people need, but it's what they want. It really pulls at their heart. I'm used to always deciding everything myself. It's a blessing, but also a terrible defect.
item.excerpt:encoded:
High heeled sandals in faux suede from NLY Shoes available on NELLY.com. These heels haveacute rounded toe with a strap at front and go with everything.
  • 13 cm Heel
  • 2.5 cm Platform
  • Synthetic insole
  • Rubber outsole

item.title: Olympia Lace Dress
item.dc:creator: totalthememain
item.content:encoded: You cannot be creative with people around you. An evening dress that reveals a woman's ankles while walking is the most disgusting thing I have ever seen. When I was young, I lived like an old woman, and when I got old, I had to live like a young person. Fashion is made to become unfashionable. I think in the darkest moments, we need a break.
item.excerpt:encoded:
Dress in lace from Dry Lake on NELLY.com. This beautiful navy blue fitted lace dress features a hidden zipper closure at side and low neckline at back.
  • Midnight colored lace
  • 100% Polyester lining
  • 92% Nylon
  • 8% Spandex

item.title: Over Knee Stiletto Boot
item.dc:creator: totalthememain
item.content:encoded: Fashion is always of the time in which you live. It is not something standing alone. But the grand problem, the most important problem, is to rejeuvenate women. To make women look young. Then their outlook changes. They feel more joyous. I'm used to always deciding everything myself. It's a blessing, but also a terrible defect. It is difficult to talk about fashion in the abstract, without a human body before my eyes, without drawings, without a choice of fabric - without a practical or visual reality. Luxury must be comfortable, otherwise it is not luxury. Fashion fades, only style remains the same.
item.excerpt:encoded:
Thigh-high boots in faux suede from NLY Shoes on NELLY.com. These boots were made for walking with a sexy pointy toe, a thin covered stiletto heel, and aslit at theback.
  • 11 cm Heel
  • Synthetic insole
  • Rubber outsole
  • Animal friendly

item.title: Peplum Thin Strap Dress
item.dc:creator: totalthememain
item.content:encoded: There is always an emotional element to anything that you make. We must never confuse elegance with snobbery. Sometimes the simplest things are the most profound. Age and size are only numbers. It's the attitude you bring to clothes that make the difference. Fashion is a very stressful place to work because of the demands of doing the shows - no one expects a writer to produce two books a year on the dot - but it's also a very toxic place to work.
item.excerpt:encoded:
Peplum dress from NLY One only available from NELLY.com. This demure little dress has thin shoulder straps and rouchedpeplum waist that skims your hips.
  • Baby pink color
  • Jersey material
  • 97% Polyester
  • 3% Elastane

item.title: Platform Pump
item.dc:creator: totalthememain
item.content:encoded: First I made a dress because I was pregnant and I wanted to be the most beautiful pregnant woman. Then I made a sweater because I wanted to have one that wasn't like anyone else's. My job is to bring out in people what they wouldn't dare do themselves. I am no longer concerned with sensation and innovation, but with the perfection of my style. The key to my collections is sensuality. I think God is the most fantastic designer.
item.excerpt:encoded:
Pumps in faux suede from NLY Shoes from NELLY.com. This sexy platform pump with a super high, thin, covered heeland a rounded toe is a classic addition to your closet.
  • 4 cm Platform
  • 14cm Heel
  • Synthetic insole
  • Rubber outsole

item.title: Pointy Lace Up Pump
item.dc:creator: totalthememain
item.content:encoded: If you cut a painter's hands off, he'd still feel the urge to pick up a brush. I think God is the most fantastic designer. People said making clothes inside out was not proper. I disagreed, because clothes that are inside out are as beautiful as a cathedral. Women are more sure of themselves today. They don't have to emulate the way men dress. It's really easy to get colors right. It's really hard to get black - and neutrals - right. Black is certainly a color but it's also an illusion.
item.excerpt:encoded:
Pumps in faux suede from NLY Shoes from NELLY.com. These faux suede heels have delicate lacing at the ankleand a thin, covered heel with a pointed toe.
  • 9 cm Heel
  • Synthetic insole
  • Rubber outsole
  • Animal friendly

item.title: Shiny Panel V Dress
item.dc:creator: totalthememain
item.content:encoded: I love things that age well - things that don't date, that stand the test of time and that become living examples of the absolute best. All I did my first year at Vogue was Xerox. Women are more sure of themselves today. They don't have to emulate the way men dress. I am what I am. Before I was not so proud to make fashion. My family thought fashion wasn't very interesting. So I hid that. For me, art is about learning and about living with people. It's alive.
item.excerpt:encoded:
Sequin dress from NLY One only available from NELLY.com. This dress stands out with a seductive v-neck and athin halter shoulder strap covered in gold sequins.
  • Gold sequins
  • 100% Polyester
  • 100% Polyester lining
  • Halter straps

item.title: Simply Pink Lip Crayon
item.dc:creator: totalthememain
item.content:encoded: I believe that my clothes can give people a better image of themselves - that it can increase their feelings of confidence and happiness. Comfort is very important to me. I think people live better in big houses and in big clothes. If you cut a painter's hands off, he'd still feel the urge to pick up a brush. I always thought what you wore underneath was as important as what you wear on top. I am what I am. Before I was not so proud to make fashion. My family thought fashion wasn't very interesting. So I hid that.
item.excerpt:encoded:
Lip pencil from NYX available on NELLY.com. This smooth, glossy lip crayon changes to match your skin tone and is easy to grab and take with you on the go.
  • Color - First Base
  • Twist-up
  • Glossy finish
  • Not tested on animals

item.title: Slingback Platform Pump
item.dc:creator: totalthememain
item.content:encoded: I love my beauty. It's not my fault. I have my favourite fashion decade, yes, yes, yes: '60s. It was a sort of little revolution; the clothes were amazing but not too exaggerated. Beauty is perfect in its imperfections, so you just have to go with the imperfections. Dressing is a way of life. We have got to change our ethics and our financial system and our whole way of understanding the world. It has to be a world in which people live rather than die; a sustainable world. It could be great.
item.excerpt:encoded:
Pumps in faux suede from NLY Shoes only at NELLY.com. This classic slingback goes with just about everything thanks to the simple and classic style.
  • 13 cmHeel
  • 3 cm Platform
  • Synthetic insole
  • Rubber outsole

item.title: Crystal Cocktail Ring
item.dc:creator: totalthememain
item.content:encoded: I am not interested in shock tactics. I just want to make beautiful clothes. It pains me physically to see a woman victimized, rendered pathetic, by fashion. I didn't consider myself a fashion designer at all at the time of punk. I was just using fashion as a way to express my resistance and to be rebellious. I came from the country, and by the time I got to London, I considered myself to be very stupid. It was my ambition to understand the world I live in. I am always locked in my design studio. The difference between style and fashion is quality.
item.excerpt:encoded:
Crystal Cocktail Ring from NLY Accessories from NELLY.com.This simple and minimal champagne ring is delicate and perfect for every outfit that needs a little sparkle.
  • Nickel free
  • Adjustable band
  • Champagne stone
  • Minimal design

item.title: Strappy Stiletto Sandal
item.dc:creator: totalthememain
item.content:encoded: I've always thought of the T-shirt as the Alpha and Omega of the fashion alphabet. Luxury must be comfortable, otherwise it is not luxury. My dresses are very reasonably priced, for dresses that are cut on the body. I am no longer concerned with sensation and innovation, but with the perfection of my style. Fashion is always of the time in which you live. It is not something standing alone. But the grand problem, the most important problem, is to rejeuvenate women. To make women look young. Then their outlook changes. They feel more joyous.
item.excerpt:encoded:
Platform sandals from NLY SHOES on NELLY.com. These platform sandals are made of vegan faux leatherwith an adjustable ankle strap and metalbuckle.
  • 12.5 cm Heel
  • 3.5 cm Platform
  • Faux leather
  • Animal friendly

item.title: Sweetheart Neckline Dress
item.dc:creator: totalthememain
item.content:encoded: Money is the most corrosive aspect of life today because it means that all attention to detail is forgotten. Fashion is not something that exists in dresses only. Fashion is in the sky, in the street, fashion has to do with ideas, the way we live, what is happening. I can design a collection in a day and I always do, cause I've always got a load of Italians on my back, moaning that it's late. I want to thank all the women who have worn my clothes, the famous and the unknown, who have been so faithful to me and given me so much joy. I feel that things happen for a reason and open up new opportunities.
item.excerpt:encoded:
Dress in jersey from NLY One from NELLY.com. This super soft dress has a ribbed texture and heart-shaped cut. Wide straps at the shoulders add extra comfort.
  • Raspberry
  • Soft fabric
  • 95% Polyester
  • 5% Elastane

item.title: Fishbone Chain Choker Necklace
item.dc:creator: totalthememain
item.content:encoded: Design is a series of creative choices - it's a collaborative effort, an evolutionary process. You choose your fabrics depending upon what you want to say, then you work with mills to get those fabrics. Through the process, you realize what you want it to be. Age is something only in your head or a stereotype. Age means nothing when you are passionate about something. You cannot be creative with people around you. I am what I am. Before I was not so proud to make fashion. My family thought fashion wasn't very interesting. So I hid that. Women are more sure of themselves today. They don't have to emulate the way men dress.

Fishbone Choker Necklace with thin chains from NLY Accessories only on NELLY.com. This necklace has a delicate set of fishbone chins and and adjustable clasp closure.
  • Goldtone
  • Adjustable hook back
  • Nickel free
  • Extender included

item.title: Transparent Fixing Powder
item.dc:creator: totalthememain
item.content:encoded: I've always thought of the T-shirt as the Alpha and Omega of the fashion alphabet. It pains me physically to see a woman victimized, rendered pathetic, by fashion. The important thing is to take your time and not get stressed. I am always locked in my design studio. Fashion can be this mysterious thing that you can't explain.

Transparent, loose powder with minerals that suit all skin tones available from NELLY.com.Buff this trasparent powder to set your foundation or to absorb excess oil.
  • Transparent color
  • Matte finish
  • Powder puff included
  • Absorbs oil

item.title: Twist-Up Matte Lips
item.dc:creator: totalthememain
item.content:encoded: Design is a constant challenge to balance comfort with luxe, the practical with the desirable. I don't try to be in fashion; I don't try to follow trends. You just end up out of fashion that way. Fashion should be fun. It shouldn't be labelled intellectual. Men don't want another man to look at their woman because they don't know how to handle it. I love the 2000s because everyone started to love haute couture.
item.excerpt:encoded:
Twist-Up Matte Lipstick from Isadora on NELLY.com. This twist-ip lipstickprovides you with velvety matte lips with a creamy and soft feeling and lasting intense color.
  • Color - Queen of Roses
  • Fragrance-free
  • Clinically tested
  • Animal friendly

item.title: Two Way Sequin Shoulder Pad Bodycon
item.dc:creator: totalthememain
item.content:encoded: I don't like trends. They tend to make everybody look the same. My job is to bring out in people what they wouldn't dare do themselves. Dressing up. People just don't do it anymore. We have to change that. I love my beauty. It's not my fault. I believe in comfort. If you don't feel comfortable in your clothes, it's hard to think of anything else.
item.excerpt:encoded:
Sequin dress from AX PARIS from NELLY.com. This fun and flirty dress is perfect for parties and features a rounded neckline and padded shoulders.
  • Gold sequins
  • Fully lined
  • 100% Polyester lining
  • Hidden zipper

item.title: V Neck Rounded Back Lace Bodycon Dress
item.dc:creator: totalthememain
item.content:encoded: Even Michelangelo got paid for doing the Sistine Chapel. To those artists who say they're doing it for the love of art, I say: Get real. Fashion to me has become very disposable; I wanted to get back to craft, to clothes that could last. Online media is increasingly influential in fashion. I think God is the most fantastic designer. That is the key of this collection, being yourself. Don't be into trends. Don't make fashion own you, but you decide what you are, what you want to express by the way you dress and the way to live.
item.excerpt:encoded:
Lace dress from John Zack only at NELLY.com. The deep v-neck, open backand seductive black lace make this your go to little blackdress.
  • Black lace
  • Fully lined
  • 60% Nylon
  • 35% Viscose
  • 5% Elastane

item.title: Vmmalou Cross Over Bag
item.dc:creator: totalthememain
item.content:encoded: Sometimes incompetence is useful. It helps you keep an open mind. Vanity is the healthiest thing in life. Beauty is perfect in its imperfections, so you just have to go with the imperfections. Awkwardness gives me great comfort. I've never been cool, but I've felt cool. I've been in the cool place, but I wasn't really cool - I was trying to pass for hip or cool. It's the awkwardness that's nice. It pains me physically to see a woman victimized, rendered pathetic, by fashion.

item.title: Zip Tassel Foldover Xbody
item.dc:creator: totalthememain
item.content:encoded: My job is to bring out in people what they wouldn't dare do themselves. I am especially grateful that I have been able to keep my own style over the decades, in spite of the many changes that have taken place in the world of fashion and in its business. It should be natural, and that's how I like women to look. I like them to feel comfortable and look organic. Dressing is a way of life. Women are women, and hurray for that.
